<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Designli has received positive feedback regarding their team dynamics and collaboration. Clients noted that the team operated seamlessly, with one client stating, &#39;Everyone was moving in unison,&#39; highlighting their effective communication and coordination. The proactive nature of the team and their ability to translate technical language for clients were also praised, contributing to an overall sentiment of satisfaction with their professionalism and teamwork.
      </p>
    </div>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="944957"
              data-gtm_insight_id="978640"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Team players
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express a strong sentiment of teamwork when working with Matrix Media Solutions (P) Ltd., emphasizing their professionalism and responsiveness. One client highlighted how the team, particularly Pritam and Abhishek, actively collaborated on monetization strategies, demonstrating ownership of the project. The client noted, &#39;I truly feel like we’re a team now,&#39; reflecting an effective partnership. Overall, feedback indicates that Matrix Media fosters a collaborative environment, ensuring that clients feel involved and valued throughout the development process.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="944957"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="228290"
          data-gtm_insight_id="978640"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Development for Mediation & Training Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 25, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Moreover, they’re friendly and take ownership of my app, showing me that they understand their responsibilities. Pritam is a great team leader. <b>He coordinates everything</b>. When I send an email, <b>he always gets back to me through Zoom, Google Meet, and chats</b>. Moreover, the team is realistic in terms of timelines — <b>they’ve managed my expectations well</b>. We’re moving in the right direction at a good pace. They keep showing me signs of their work and tell me whenever they have a holiday. Overall, everything is well-coordinated and managed.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback highlights the strong team player sentiment at Spyrosoft BSG, with one client noting that the cooperation felt seamless and that BSG&#39;s team acted as an extension of their own. Another client praised their flexibility and solution-oriented approach, emphasizing their commitment to finding workarounds and maintaining open communication. Overall, clients express high satisfaction with BSG&#39;s collaborative spirit and dedication to achieving mutual goals.
      </p>

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Wve Labs consistently exceeds client expectations, as evidenced by multiple reviews. One client highlighted their exceptional design quality and responsiveness, stating, &#34;The app&#39;s quality and the vendor&#39;s delivery speed exceeded my expectations.&#34; Another client praised their project management, noting, &#34;They’ve met every milestone on time, if not early.&#34; Overall, clients commend Wve Labs for their professionalism, transparency, and ability to deliver outstanding products, making them a commendable choice for future projects.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        MindSea is consistently praised for their team-oriented approach, with clients noting their collaborative and consultative style. One client emphasized that MindSea feels like an extension of their own team, highlighting the strong communication and trust established. Another remarked on the rapid response to needs and the integrity displayed by the team. Overall, clients express a sentiment of partnership, indicating that MindSea&#39;s team players greatly enhance project success.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="28474"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="294028"
          data-gtm_insight_id="715155"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev & UX/UI Design for Software Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 11, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Mindsea worked with me to come up with a more cost effective way to handle project management. I have background in coding and working with development teams on project prioritization so we decided to share the project management responsibilities over having a dedicated project manager. This led to a development process that was faster, more cost effective and cut out much of the misinterpretation that can come with having a middle person between the client and the people doing the actual work. <b>We are like a bullet train working together</b>, however, I will say that our working relationship relies on two way trust which we built quickly and with solid communication.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/mindsea/294028"

            data-gtm_insight_id="715155"

          </a>
        </li>

          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="28474"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="46894"
          data-gtm_insight_id="715155"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">App Development for News Provider</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 20, 2015</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              MindSea almost acts as an extension of my own team. <b>They're extremely consultative and collaborative</b>. It's not a factory. They operate the way I need them to. In other words if I say to them what we want to do, they're not just going to do it. They're going to think about it, provide their expertise, and come back to me if they think that there's a way to make it better.
            </p>
          </div>

Across various reviews, 100% of clients praised their responsive project management and technical skills, highlighting their ability to deliver on time and adapt to client needs efficiently. Although some clients noted areas for improvement in initial project planning and documentation, the overall feedback is overwhelmingly positive, with clients reporting increased user engagement and satisfaction post-collaboration.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The reviews highlight Jafton as effective team players, noted for their clear communication and integration with client teams. One client praised Jafton for their seamless collaboration, stating they &#39;easily integrated with our team&#39; and exhibited &#39;dedication to solving issues.&#39; Another client emphasized their quick communication and responsiveness, asserting they were a &#39;great partner&#39; in the development process. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Jafton&#39;s collaborative approach and commitment to client success.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Busy Human for exceeding their expectations, particularly in delivering impressive results. One client noted they aimed for 200 interactions but received 850, highlighting exceptional outcomes. The company&#39;s communication and responsiveness were frequently commended, with one reviewer stating, &#39;Busy Human is by far the best in the way they communicate.&#39; Their expertise and proactive approach were also recognized, with clients expressing trust in their capabilities against larger competitors.
      </p>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="2051375"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1611563"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Memory Squared has consistently exceeded client expectations, as evidenced by the feedback from multiple reviewers. One client highlighted their impressive project management and timely delivery, stating, &#39;The final product... has exceeded my expectations.&#39; Another client praised their proactive approach and effective communication, noting, &#39;They’ve been very friendly and creative throughout this process.&#39; Overall, clients express high satisfaction with Memory Squared&#39;s services, emphasizing their professionalism and ability to adapt to project needs.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="2051375"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="293263"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Appinventiv consistently exceeds client expectations, as evidenced by multiple reviews. Clients praised their exceptional project management and technical expertise, noting that they delivered advanced features and met tight deadlines. For instance, one client highlighted their ability to engage hard-to-reach communities in challenging environments, while another commended their thorough communication and adaptability. Overall, clients expressed high satisfaction, recommending Appinventiv for its professionalism, dedication, and ability to provide value beyond initial projections.
      </p>
    </div>

              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>

            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Appinventiv has over-delivered from day one, and we have exceeded all our goals in very difficult circumstances, engaging users in remote and conflict affected parts of East Africa. Firstly, <b>Appinventiv were able to build advanced features into our minimum value project, well beyond anything that could have been reasonably expected</b>. Second, we were able to achieve the very difficult task of rolling out a trial in remote parts of South Sudan and Sudan, testing and enhancing as we went along.

Another client emphasized their competitive, comprehensive solutions and effective budget management, noting that Synodus consistently delivered more than anticipated. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction and appreciation for Synodus&#39;s dedication to client success.

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Digital Banking Platform Development for FinTech Firm
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  Synodus built a digital banking platform for a fintech firm. The platform featured a current and savings account, a lending and borrowing system, and a payment system. They used APIs and cloud

Grey Chain's commitment to client satisfaction and technical excellence is consistently emphasized in client feedback.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients perceive Grey Chain as exemplary team players, highlighting their collaborative approach and dedication to project success. One client noted their involvement across various project stages, emphasizing the team&#39;s agile methodology and proactive risk management. The feedback underscores the team&#39;s commitment to partnership, with one client stating they &#39;truly partner with us&#39; and exhibit &#39;efforts and behaviors far beyond the committed work stack.&#39; Overall, sentiment towards Grey Chain&#39;s teamwork is overwhelmingly positive.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="181039"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="10475"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1877104"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">IT Consulting & SI for Publishing Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 7, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The team operates in complete agile fashion. There is a two-week sprint cycle having clear milestones and deliverables. The team has also laid down a steering committee structure <b>which includes senior members from Grey Chain team to provide regular updates</b> which include milestone plan, risk awareness, resource plan etc. <b>They truly partner with us like it is their product</b> and they ensure successful delivery by exhibiting efforts and behaviors far beyond the committed work stack.
            </p>
          </div>

            >Techne. is a highly regarded mobile app development company that excels in creating bespoke applications for iOS and Android platforms. The company garners overwhelmingly positive feedback for its commitment to client success, proactive communication, and technical prowess, with 100% of reviewers praising their project management skills and dedication to fostering long-term partnerships. Clients particularly appreciate Techne.'s ability to deliver user-friendly and feature-rich applications that align with their business goals.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Techne consistently exceeds client expectations, as highlighted by a founder who noted that the final app not only matched but surpassed the initial design and brief. Another client praised the team&#39;s ability to elevate a simple idea into a polished app, stating they received far beyond what was anticipated. Overall, clients commend the exceptional communication, professionalism, and responsiveness throughout the project, leading to a sentiment of high satisfaction and strong recommendations.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently describe Five Pack as effective team players who integrate seamlessly into their projects. One client noted that Five Pack &#39;felt like they were on our team&#39; and demonstrated a commitment to understanding their business needs. Another emphasized the &#39;team collaboration&#39; and the ability to work as business partners rather than a traditional supplier-client relationship. Overall, the feedback reflects a strong sentiment of partnership and responsiveness, with only minor concerns regarding communication towards the project&#39;s end.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="38544"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="188185"
          data-gtm_insight_id="726720"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Development Services for Social Media Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Mar 17, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The entire Five Pack team we have engaged with have been <b>extremely responsive throughout the project</b>. Very high aptitude for Project Management, able to keep things on track, push back on things we may not have needed and suggest alternatives and conducts themselves in a very professional manner. <b>Their ability as a team to connect with us right from the start</b> and work as if they were part of our own company.
            </p>
          </div>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="152698"

                Proactive
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, Owlab OÜ has received positive feedback regarding their proactive approach. Clients noted their effective communication and swift responses to project needs, exemplified by one client stating, &#34;They are very proactive in communication to all project stakeholders to find answers or a solution and deliver features in time.&#34; Another client emphasized their project manager&#39;s proactive advising, which led to more logical solutions. This consistent sentiment underscores Owlab&#39;s commitment to maintaining an engaged and responsive partnership.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="152698"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="216204"
          data-gtm_insight_id="812684"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">iOS & Android App Development for Fintech Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 13, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              OWLAB professionals can overtake ongoing projects very easily and in a short period of time. They are very <b>proactive in communication to all project stakeholders in order to find answers or a solution and deliver features in time</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/owlab-o/216204"
            title="View Owlab OÜ Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="152698"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="216204"
            data-gtm_insight_id="812684"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="152698"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="3669"
          data-gtm_insight_id="812684"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Development for Marketing & Campaign App Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 28, 2021</span>
            </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback highlights AltexSoft&#39;s strong team player sentiment, emphasizing their dedication to project success. One client noted that AltexSoft felt like part of their team rather than an external vendor, showcasing effective collaboration through weekly status calls and open communication channels. Another client praised the company&#39;s commitment, stating, &#34;Our problems become their problems,&#34; reflecting a deep investment in client projects. Overall, feedback indicates a high level of satisfaction with AltexSoft&#39;s collaborative approach.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="5583"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="30622"
          data-gtm_insight_id="695160"
        >

        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations

Clients praised their exceptional professionalism, timely project completion ahead of schedule, and effective communication. Notably, the developers significantly improved system stability and user experience, demonstrating a strong alignment with client goals. <section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Innovative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express a strong sentiment of innovation regarding Onabitz&#39;s work, particularly highlighting their ability to understand complex project needs and deliver creative solutions. One client noted Onabitz&#39;s contributions of &#39;experience, ingenuity, and precision&#39; in developing an AI-driven telemedicine platform with innovative user interactions. Overall, feedback indicates that Onabitz excels in providing cutting-edge design and functionality, ensuring timely and effective project execution.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_insight_id="1963913"

          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">UI/UX Design for AI Healthcare Software Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 20, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Manel López (CEO) has perfectly understood the needs and requirements of our project and has contributed <b>experience, ingenuity, and precision</b> to solve the numerous challenges that have been posed to <b>reinterpret the interaction between humans in a machine environment</b>.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        JetThoughts is consistently recognized for their proactive approach, particularly in providing actionable recommendations and effective solutions. One client noted their &#39;hands-on approach&#39; and &#39;clear, practical recommendations&#39; that facilitated seamless implementation of changes. Another highlighted their ability to accurately project needs and support scaling efforts, emphasizing that JetThoughts is more of a partner than a contractor. Overall, clients express satisfaction with JetThoughts’ responsiveness and commitment to understanding their business challenges.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Dev & Business Consulting for Software Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 17, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              JetThoughts provided a comprehensive code review and stakeholder analysis, delivering short-term and mid-term recommendations to improve our development process. They <b>outlined clear steps on how to implement these changes</b> and provided guidance on who could assist with the execution, which made the transition seamless. Their ability to provide clear, practical recommendations and the <b>hands-on approach made it easy to implement changes</b>.
            </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Trustworthy
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback highlights Axisway Scotland&#39;s trustworthiness, with multiple reviews emphasizing their commitment to transparency and alignment of values. One client noted, &#34;We never experienced anything but great attention and intimacy from the team,&#34; reflecting a strong collaborative relationship. Another stated, &#34;Their commitment to maintaining transparency with clients about project statuses... could build substantial trust.&#34; Overall, clients express high confidence in Axisway&#39;s capabilities and reliability throughout project execution.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_insight_id="1354102"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Product Dev Support for IT Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 23, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Axisway's ability to integrate cutting-edge blockchain technology into their projects is particularly impressive. For the NFT Marketplace, they could have used advanced smart contract protocols and security features that not only ensure the security and integrity of transactions but also enhance user trust. Their approach to leveraging decentralized finance (DeFi) elements to create additional value for users might also be noteworthy. <b>Commitment to Transparency and Ethics: If Axisway operates with a high level of transparency in their project management and development processes and adheres strictly to ethical standards, particularly in an industry fraught with regulatory scrutiny, this would be quite impressive.</b> Their commitment to maintaining transparency with clients about project statuses, challenges, and successes could build substantial trust and long-term relationships.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Communicative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Sailing Byte has received overwhelmingly positive feedback regarding their communicative approach. Clients emphasized the importance of regular updates and meetings, with one stating that &#39;good communication&#39; was crucial for successful project management. Another client noted that Sailing Byte&#39;s team was &#39;always on top of our discussions,&#39; ensuring clarity and alignment throughout the project. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for their responsiveness and effective communication practices.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1786228"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="305140"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1076703"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Portal Design & Development for Dog Food Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 5, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The project was managed with a strong emphasis on communication and timely delivery. <b>Weekly meetings were held to discuss progress, address any issues, and ensure alignment with project goals.</b> Additionally, an Asana board was utilized for task management and tracking. Overall, the project management approach was highly effective, characterized by excellent communication, timely delivery, and responsiveness to our needs.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Honest
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The feedback regarding APPVALES reflects a strong sentiment of honesty and transparency. Clients noted that the team provided consistent and clear communication, with one client emphasizing the &#39;honest feedback&#39; received throughout the project. Another client highlighted APPVALES&#39; reliability, stating they delivered exactly what was promised and addressed unrealistic expectations candidly. Overall, clients expressed satisfaction with the integrity and straightforwardness of APPVALES&#39; approach, reinforcing their value as a trustworthy partner.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          data-gtm_insight_id="1054462"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">App Dev for Professional Social Networking Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 24, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The communication with APPVALES team was consistent and with ease. There was no pretense or wasted conversations, <b>They listened,, understood and executed. Also of value was the honest feedback I received from Maks and the team when there were issues to solve</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Fgfactory has consistently exceeded client expectations, particularly in delivering high-quality visual assets for mobile games. A CEO from No Six Five praised their talented designers for producing professional graphics, stating, &#39;I’m happy with the overall completion of their design work.&#39; The client highlighted the team&#39;s ability to meet high standards and deliver exceptional value at reasonable costs, reinforcing an overall sentiment of satisfaction and confidence in Fgfactory&#39;s capabilities.
      </p>
    </div>

          data-gtm_insight_id="1747787"

            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They always meet my <b>high expectations</b>. I’m happy with the overall completion of their design work. We manage the project through Basecamp.

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="47113"

              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Team players
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently describe Aimprosoft as a valuable team player, integrating seamlessly into their own teams. One client noted, &#39;We increasingly work with them as if they were a part of our team.&#39; Another emphasized Aimprosoft&#39;s ability to manage development autonomously, stating they became &#39;a part of our own company.&#39; Overall, feedback reflects a strong sentiment of collaboration and reliability, with clients appreciating the proactive efforts and care shown by Aimprosoft&#39;s team.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="47113"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="79124"
          data-gtm_insight_id="732516"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Whitelabel Development for Automotive Software Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">3.5</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 70%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 5, 2016</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We've been moving towards an Agile methodology. It has been a bumpy process both internally and with the Aimprosoft team, but <b>we increasingly work with them as if they were a part of our team</b>. As our business has succeeded and grown, we've come to invest more in this area and ask more of Aimprosoft. I see Aimprosoft as being on our team, and I will try to help them succeed.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/aimprosoft/79124"
            title="View Aimprosoft Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="47113"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="79124"
            data-gtm_insight_id="732516"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="47113"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="72647"
          data-gtm_insight_id="732516"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">White Labeled Web Portal Development and Integration</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 11, 2016</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The fact that they were able to work as a defined development team was important. <b>We didn't simply receive individual developers whom we'd have to control, but rather a packaged IT team, including a project manager, developers, and testers</b>. Aimprosoft was effectively an offshore development team, and <b>they became a part of our own company</b>. Developer continuity was also critical to us.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/aimprosoft/72647"
            title="View Aimprosoft Reviews"

            data-gtm_review_id="72647"
            data-gtm_insight_id="732516"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
      </ul>
    </div>

With a focus on clear communication and technical expertise, they are praised for their effective project management and collaboration skills. Reviews indicate high client satisfaction, highlighting their professionalism, responsiveness, and ability to solve complex problems. Notably, 100% of reviewers were impressed with their communication and integration with client teams.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback indicates a strong sentiment regarding Prosperity Software&#39;s team player mentality. They are described as &#39;fun&#39; and integral to the client&#39;s team, demonstrating autonomy in project execution. One client noted, &#39;They make good decisions without needing a lot of support,&#39; highlighting their proactive approach. While there were minor concerns about communication speed, the overall impression was positive, emphasizing their collaborative spirit and effective project management.
      </p>
    </div>

        Smart Tech LLC received positive feedback regarding their customized support, particularly for their tailored approach to the food and beverage industry. The client highlighted their ability to fully understand specific business needs and deliver a mobile app that met those requirements.     <div class="provider-insight__summary">

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently express that Pear Shadow exceeds expectations through exceptional service and commitment to understanding project goals. One client highlighted that Pear Shadow not only delivered the envisioned MVP app but also provided expert strategic advice, demonstrating a genuine interest in building a trustworthy relationship. Their proactive communication and project management further reinforce a strong partnership, with feedback indicating a high level of satisfaction and a willingness to recommend their services to others.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="2081390"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="305102"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1981285"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev & Support for Social Networking Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 5, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Pearshadow successfully delivered the application I had envisioned, and beyond. What strikes me the most about Pearshadow is that they do not only look into delivering what you ask of them, <b>but they go above and beyond to understand what you're trying to achieve</b>, providing suggestions based on their experience, and in turn, building a relationship built on trust. Pearshadow is not like most of the other development companies, who just want to make money off of you, <b>but they genuinely want to build a relationship and solid partnership that is built on trust</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

                Collaborative
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed a strong sentiment towards the collaborative nature of Jimmy Technologies, highlighting their effective integration into existing teams. One client noted the impressive communication and professional approach, stating that Jimmy&#39;s team worked seamlessly with various departments, including legal and marketing. Additionally, the involvement of a dedicated product owner facilitated alignment on requirements, ensuring that development met the client&#39;s needs. While initial alignment was necessary, subsequent collaboration was reported as smooth and efficient.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1368926"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="156723"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1422455"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Application Development for Trading Education Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 3, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Jimmy has 1 product owner responsible for gathering and shaping our requirements and he ensures that Jimmy's development produces the product according to our needs and requirements. The solution architect is involved in high-level discussions regarding used tools, technologies and architecture. <b>Their engineers are in touch with our tech team and they align on DevOps and other processes or operations</b>. We use Google Space for communication.
            </p>
          </div>

            target="_blank"

        <div class="lm-only-related-block">
    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that company’s size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a company’s specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

        <h3 class="sg-article-card__title">Outsourcing App Development: What You Need to Know for a Successful Partnership in 2025</h3>

        </div>
        
            <p class="sg-article-card__description">Learn everything you need to know about how to successfully outsource app development. 
</p>
        
        <div class="sg-article-card__tags">

<div class="sg-article-card" data-article-type="directory_articles">
    <a
        href="/resources/scaling-mobile-app-development-from-amit-samsukha"
        class="sg-article-card__link"
        title="Global Talent, Local Impact: Amit Samsukha on Scaling Mobile App Development"
        aria-label="Read the article 'Global Talent, Local Impact: Amit Samsukha on Scaling Mobile App Development'"
    ></a>
    <img
        rel="noreferrer"
        loading="lazy"
        property="image"

%20content,%20producing%20explainer%20videos,%20product%20walkthroughs,%20commercials,%20and%20app%20videos.%20Their%20videos%20have%20generated%20over%201.3%20billion%20views,%20making%20their%20videos%20widely%20recognized%20across%20the%20globe.%20From%20concept%20to%20post-production,%20including%20scriptwriting,%20storyboarding,%20and%20motion%20graphics,%20Vidico%20delivers%20end-to-end%20video%20solutions%20that%20help%20challenger%20brands%20grow%20and%20engage%20their%20audiences.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/signature-video-group%22%20target=%22%22%3ESignature%20Video%20Group%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Toronto,%20Canada%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20Undisclosed%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2044%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%205.0%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20Signature%20Video%20Group%20(SVG)%20is%20a%20Toronto-based%20video%20production%20company%20and%20content%20agency%20specializing%20in%20creating%20impactful%20visual%20stories.%20They%20produce%20a%20wide%20range%20of%20video%20content,%20including%20broadcast%20commercials,%20branded%20documentaries,%20corporate%20communications,%20product%20demos,%20and%20training%20videos.%20SVG%20collaborates%20with%20clients%20to%20craft%20campaigns%20that%20drive%20business%20results,%20attract%20top%20talent,%20and%20simplify%20complex%20ideas.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/snowy-peak-films%22%20target=%22%22%3ESnowy%20Peak%20Films%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Denver,%20CO%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20$100%20-%20$149%20/%20hr%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2041%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%205.0%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20Snowy%20Peak%20Films%20is%20a
